name: Last Stand (Pwnzer21)
description:
Description

You believe yourself to be what remains of humanity, but how long will that last? It's only a matter of time until you get overwhelmed, try and survive with the limited resources provided. 

Controls

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move, and use E to interact with the machines. When holding a weapon press left click to attack or right-click to drop your weapon. Do jump attacks to stun zombies for longer and deal additional damage.

Items

Since I was working alone and only managed to put in about half a day, there isn't much but here are the items.

Red Machine

  • Plank - Starting Weapon,
  • Bat - Higher damage per second but a smaller range

Blue Machine

  • Barbed Plank Wall - Use or drop to place a plank wall in front of you, zombies will have to break it down before attacking you.

Fixed Bugs

 The game now ramps up in difficulty as was intended.
